alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 31 at 8:08AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tiyan Guam has issued a * Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for Poor Drainage Areas for... Northern and central Guam * Until 1000 AM ChST. * At 806 AM ChST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain which will cause urban and small stream flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas will result in minor flooding in the advisory area. Up to 1.5 inches of rain has already fallen. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dededo, Tamuning, Yigo, Mangilao, Chalan Pago-Ordot, Barrigada, Yona, Hagatna Heights, Andersen AFB, Mongmong-Toto-Maite, Sinajana, Asan and Piti. Additional rainfall of 1 to 2 inches is expected over the area. This additional rain will make minor flooding.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. A Flood Advisory means river or stream flows are elevated, or ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
